pages.fallback:
Mobs get stronger over time, based on each adventurer.

Mobs will spawn with higher health, damage, movement speed and with better armour and weapons.

Mobs spawned in different areas have special modifiers.

Some areas and biomes spawn different mobs than usual.

Mobs spawned in %1$s areas are slightly stronger.

Creepers have a higher blast radius and mobs don't drop their weapons and armour as often.

Mobs spawned in %1$s areas are weaker, but faster.

Husks swarms can be found.

More mobs carry fire aspect and flame weapons.

Mobs spawned in %1$s are more tougher to kill.

Drowneds are more powerful as well.

Zombies spawned in %1$s areas have less health, but can respawn when killed.

Slimes are larger and spawn more often.

Mobs spawned in %1$s areas are weaker, but spawn in groups.

Skeletons carry melee weapons.

Mobs can be found wearing projectile protection gear.

Mobs spawned in %1$s areas are stronger, but more sparse.

More mobs carry knockback and punch weapons.
Drowneds spawned in %1$s are much more powerful and more frequently carry tridents.

Mobs spawned in %1$s areas are slower, but have more health.

Many attacks will apply slowness.

Mobs spawned in %1$s areas are weaker, but apply weakness, hunger, and poison.

Spider clusters can be found.

Mobs can spawn with special gear.

Weapons have a 20% drop chance and armour has a 8.5% drop chance.

When dropped, the gear will need to be identified.
The following modifiers can be commonly found on weapons:

contents.fallback: - Less attack damage, but has Fire Aspect III-V
- Deals damage to everything within 4 blocks
- Makes attacked target glow and wither for 15 seconds

- Stronger attack damage, but has slower attack speed
- Knockback II-III
- Less attack damage, but quicker attack speed
- Temporarily slows and weakens attacked target

pages.fallback: The following modifiers can be rarely found on weapons:

contents.fallback: - Attacking the same mob deals double damage each hit
- Shortly after hitting a target, they will be dealt heavy damage, attacking through armor and effects
- Applies hunger to the self when a mob is hit

pages.fallback: The following modifiers can be very rarely found on weapons:

contents.fallback: - Applies healing effect to attacked target
- Stronger attack damage, but applies wither to self when a mob is hit

pages.fallback: The following armor modifiers are activated while equipped:

contents.fallback:
- Applies increasing speed and hunger while sprinting
- Lower movement speed while not sprinting

- Lower attack damage
- Applies strength to nearby allies and wolves

- Constant light around the wearer
- Crouching will apply glowing and a light pulse

- Lower attack damage
- Spawns an invulnerable dog that deals 4 damage
- Commanding to sit will cause it to lose agro
- Feeding it will grant strength

- Causes the area to be much more difficult in combat
- Increases difficulty for mob spawns

pages.fallback: The following armor modifiers are activated when damage is taken:

contents.fallback: - Temporarily gain stronger attack damage and quicker attack speed
- Applies resistance to all nearby entities when attacked by a mob

- Teleport to a random location within 16 blocks
- Full knockback resistance when equipped
- Clear all effects and stores them in a lingering potion dropped at the wearer's feet

pages.fallback: The following armor modifiers are activated when upon killing:

contents.fallback: - Regenerate half a heart of health

- Summons a totem that gives allies regeneration, resistance, speed, or strength
- Totems can stack if mobs are kill within its range of 12 blocks

- Freezes nearby mobs and can deal freezing damage
- Lower attack speed when equipped

- Permanately increases attack damage
- Converts to Satiated after fully charged

pages.fallback: The following armor modifiers are activated while not in combat:

contents.fallback:
- Quicker movement speed
- Lower attack damage when equipped

- Multiple arrows will be shot from a single arrow shot
- Lower attack damage when equipped

- Gain wither
- Higher attack damage, attack speed, and movement speed while equipped

pages.fallback: The following armor modifiers are activated while below half health:

contents.fallback:
- Thorns enchantment is greatly increased
- Only works if the armor is already enchanted with thorns

- Lower attack damage, but higher armor
- Has an opposite effect when health is above 50%

- AOE of healing effect and regeneration
- Can only happen once per day

pages.fallback: The following armor modifiers are activated while above half health:

contents.fallback:
- Higher attack damage, but lower armor
- Has an opposite effect when health is below 50%

- Damage is dealt until wearer is at half health
- Resistance III when equipped

- Higher armor and full knockback resistance
- Slower movement speed when equipped
- Immune to mining fatigue, poison, weakness, hunger, blindness, nausea, and wither
- When nearby allies take damage, 60% will be dealt into the wearer instead of the ally

pages.fallback: The following armor modifiers are activated during night:

contents.fallback:
- Higher attack damage, attack speed, movement speed, and armor
- Based on moon phase, with full moon granting highest buffs
- AOE of slowness, but wearer is unaffected
- Higher attack damage, attack speed, and movement speed

- Resistance while wearer is not hungry
- Taking damage applies high hunger
